## WELCOME ~ to my growing website!!

I am a passionate early career data enthusiast on a journey of exploration and discovery within the vast realm of data science. As I navigate this fascinating landscape, my dedication lies in honing my data analysis skills - from delving into statistical models to crafting compelling visualizations and learning new coding platforms, every step is a venture into the ever-evolving world of data science. What drives me is the genuine excitement about the endless possibilities that working with data can offer. I invite you to learn more about me on this growing website and join me as I work on some hobby coding projects here :)
